verses.verse: And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass after <S%H310><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things, <S%H1697><s%> that one told <S%H559><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> your father <S%H1><s%> is sick: <S%H2470><s%> and he took <S%H3947><s%> with him his two <S%H8147><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> and Ephraim. <S%H669><s%>

And one told <S%H5046><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> your son <S%H1121><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> to you: and Israel <S%H3478><s%> strengthened <S%H2388><s%> himself, and sat <S%H3427><s%> on the bed. <S%H4296><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> God <S%H410><s%> Almighty <S%H7706><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to me at Luz <S%H3870><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> and blessed <S%H1288><s%> me,

And said <S%H559><s%> to me, Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I will make you fruitful, <S%H6509><s%> and multiply <S%H7235><s%> you, and I will make <S%H5414><s%> of you a multitude <S%H6951><s%> of people; <S%H5971><s%> and will give <S%H5414><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> land <S%H776><s%> to your seed <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> possession. <S%H272><s%>

And now <S%H6258><s%> your two <S%H8147><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> and Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> which were born <S%H3205><s%> to you in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> before <S%H5704><s%> I came <S%H935><s%> to you into Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> are mine; as Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> they shall be mine.

And your issue, <S%H4138><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you beget <S%H3205><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them, shall be yours, and shall be called <S%H7121><s%> after <S%H5921><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of their brothers <S%H251><s%> in their inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

And as for me, when I came <S%H935><s%> from Padan, <S%H6307><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> by me in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> in the way, <S%H1870><s%> when <S%H5750><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> there was but a little <S%H3530><s%> way <S%H776><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> to Ephrath: <S%H672><s%> and I buried <S%H6912><s%> her there <S%H8033><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of Ephrath; <S%H672><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> is Bethlehem. <S%H1035><s%>
And Israel <S%H3478><s%> beheld <S%H7200><s%> Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> are these? <S%H428><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his father, <S%H1><s%> They are my sons, <S%H1121><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> me in this <S%H2088><s%> place. And he said, <S%H559><s%> Bring <S%H3947><s%> them, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, to me, and I will bless <S%H1288><s%> them.

Now the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were dim <S%H3513><s%> for age, <S%H2207><s%> so that he could <S%H3201><s%> not see. <S%H7200><s%> And he brought <S%H5066><s%> them near <S%H5066><s%> to him; and he kissed <S%H5401><s%> them, and embraced <S%H2263><s%> them.

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> I had not thought <S%H6419><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> your face: <S%H6440><s%> and, see, <S%H2009><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has showed <S%H7200><s%> me also <S%H1571><s%> your seed. <S%H2233><s%>
And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> them out from between <S%H5973><s%> his knees, <S%H1290><s%> and he bowed <S%H7812><s%> himself with his face <S%H639><s%> to the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> them both, <S%H8147><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> in his right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> toward Israel's <S%H3478><s%> left <S%H8040><s%> hand, <S%H8040><s%> and Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> in his left <S%H8040><s%> hand <S%H8040><s%> toward Israel's <S%H3478><s%> right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> and brought <S%H5066><s%> them near <S%H5066><s%> to him.

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> stretched <S%H7971><s%> out his right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> and laid <S%H7896><s%> it on Ephraim's <S%H669><s%> head, <S%H7218><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> was the younger, <S%H6810><s%> and his left <S%H8040><s%> hand <S%H8040><s%> on Manasseh's <S%H4519><s%> head, <S%H7218><s%> guiding his hands <S%H3027><s%> wittingly; <S%H7919><s%> for Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> was the firstborn. <S%H1060><s%>

And he blessed <S%H1288><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> my fathers <S%H1><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> and Isaac <S%H3327><s%> did walk, <S%H1980><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> which fed <S%H7462><s%> me all my life long <S%H5750><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%>

The Angel <S%H4397><s%> which redeemed <S%H1350><s%> me from all <S%H3605><s%> evil, <S%H7451><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> the lads; <S%H5288><s%> and let my name <S%H8034><s%> be named <S%H7121><s%> on them, and the name <S%H8034><s%> of my fathers <S%H1><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> and Isaac; <S%H3327><s%> and let them grow <S%H1711><s%> into a multitude <S%H7230><s%> in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And when Joseph <S%H3130><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that his father <S%H1><s%> laid <S%H7896><s%> his right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> it displeased <S%H7489><s%> <S%H5869><s%> him: and he held <S%H8551><s%> up his father's <S%H1><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> to remove <S%H5493><s%> it from Ephraim's <S%H669><s%> head <S%H7218><s%> to Manasseh's <S%H4519><s%> head. <S%H7218><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his father, <S%H1><s%> Not so, <S%H3651><s%> my father: <S%H1><s%> for this <S%H2088><s%> is the firstborn; <S%H1060><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> your right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> on his head. <S%H7218><s%>

And his father <S%H1><s%> refused, <S%H3985><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> it, my son, <S%H1121><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> it: he also <S%H1571><s%> shall become <S%H1961><s%> a people, <S%H5971><s%> and he also <S%H1571><s%> shall be great: <S%H1431><s%> but truly <S%H199><s%> his younger <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> shall be greater <S%H1431><s%> than he, and his seed <S%H2233><s%> shall become <S%H1961><s%> a multitude <S%H4393><s%> of nations. <S%H1471><s%>

And he blessed <S%H1288><s%> them that day, <S%H3117><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> In you shall Israel <S%H3478><s%> bless, <S%H1288><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> God <S%H430><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> you as Ephraim <S%H669><s%> and as Manasseh: <S%H4519><s%> and he set <S%H7760><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%>

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I die: <S%H4191><s%> but God <S%H430><s%> shall be with you, and bring <S%H7725><s%> you again <S%H7725><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of your fathers. <S%H1><s%>

Moreover I have given <S%H5414><s%> to you one <S%H259><s%> portion <S%H7926><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> your brothers, <S%H251><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I took <S%H3947><s%> out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Amorite <S%H567><s%> with my sword <S%H2719><s%> and with my bow. <S%H7198><s%>
